name: Destiny Duel
description:
Destiny Duel is a PvP psychological strategy game. To win, you must eliminate your opponent with 4 moves at your disposal: Attack, Guard, Recover, and Dodge. Each move counters one another, and the goal is to predict your opponent - using the right move in the right situation.

- Simple to learn gameplay with only 4 buttons/controls

- 7 Maps with different effects

- Rank medal system

- Many unique cosmetics to customize your character with
